resources.string: Donegal won their first All Ireland football final in 1992.
Letterkenny is home to Finn Harps soccer club.
Donegal Town is the capital town of Donegal.
Donegal is Ireland\'s most northerly county.
Ballyshannon is the oldest town in Ireland.
Tory Island is the only place in Ireland that still has it\'s own King.
The largest fishing harbour in Europe is found in Killybegs.
Donegal is full of wile handlin\'s, rare bucks, and headers, hi.
It is customary to give a variety of salutes when passing a car in Donegal.
Donegal has some of the most renowned surfing beaches in Europe.
The questions are all True or False.\nYou have to answer 7 questions.\nYou are allowed to skip 3 questions.
